name: ai-code-generator
description: AI-powered code generator that creates production-ready HTML, CSS, and JavaScript projects using Claude AI with real-time generation and iterative improvements

scripts.frontend:start: cd frontend && npm run build && serve -s build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.test: echo "Run 'npm test' in backend and frontend directories separately"
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build

author: AI Code Generator Team
